## Call.sendDigits() method

Send DTMF digits.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendDigits(digits: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  digits | string | A sequence of DTMF digits in a string. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

- Resolves when the DTMF digits have been sent.

## Example 1

To imitate pressing just `0` on the dialpad:

```
call.sendDigits('0');
```

## Example 2

To imitate pressing `0` then `1` on the dialpad:

```
call.sendDigits('01');
```
